param.name: mr.GitVersion.gitCheckoutDir
param.spec: text description='The directory containing .git relative to the working directory. Leave blank for the working directory itself.' display='normal' label='Git Repository Directory:'

param.name: mr.GitVersion.output
param.spec: checkbox checkedValue='buildserver' description='Update the TeamCity build number or output JSON?' display='normal' label='Update TeamCity build version:' uncheckedValue='json'

param.name: mr.GitVersion.outputFile
param.spec: text description='Optional path to a file relative to the working directory to output the json into if you selected JSON above.' display='normal' label='Json output file:'

param.name: mr.GitVersion.url
param.spec: text description='Optional URL to remote git repository if you have not already checked one out.' display='normal' label='Remote Git Repository:'

param.name: mr.GitVersion.branch
param.spec: text description='Remote branch to use.' display='normal' label='Remote Git Branch:'

param.name: mr.GitVersion.username
param.spec: text description='Remote git repo username (if private).' display='normal' label='Remote Git Username:'

param.name: mr.GitVersion.password
param.spec: text description='Remote git repo password (if private).' display='normal' label='Remote Git Password:'

param.name: mr.GitVersion.logFile
param.spec: text description='Optional path to a file relative to the working directory to log output messages to.' display='normal' label='Log File:'

param.name: mr.GitVersion.exec
param.spec: text description='Optional executable relative to the working directory to run using GitVersion - environment vars will be available to the process.' display='normal' label='Executable:'

param.name: mr.GitVersion.execArgs
param.spec: text description='If an Executable is specified then arguments to pass to the executable.' display='normal' label='Executable Arguments:'

param.name: mr.GitVersion.proj
param.spec: text description='Optional MSBuild file relative to the working directory to run using GitVersion - environment vars will be available to the process.' display='normal' label='MSBuild File:'

param.name: mr.GitVersion.projArgs
param.spec: text description='If an MSBuild file is specified then arguments to pass to MSBuild.' display='normal' label='MSBuild Arguments:'

param.name: mr.GitVersion.updateAssemblyInfo
param.spec: checkbox checkedValue='true' description='Update any AssemblyInfo files while running the Executable or MSBuild file?' display='normal' label='Update AssemblyInfo Files:' uncheckedValue='false'
